name: Attack of the Zombiecats
description:
A game that I had made as a small prototype for a school project that grew into what I am submitting right now!

Controls: 

WASD to move

UP ARROW to shoot

LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS to aim

        Run around dodging zombified cats in sections of the abandoned world that has been infected by a zombie virus! Narrowly escape the zombies while collecting enough antidotes to cure them! Hold them off for long enough and defeat the final boss, and you've won! While still getting your ammo and not getting eaten, you also have to drink hot coco to not freeze! If the zombies don't get you, the cold will!
